instructions:
Heat oven to 450 degrees F.
Line 9-inch pie plate with crust. Bake 5 to 6 min. or until lightly browned; cool. Meanwhile, mix wafer crumbs, sugar and butter until well blended.
Reduce oven temperature to 375 degrees F. Spread cream cheese carefully onto bottom of crust; sprinkle with half the wafer crumb mixture. Combine fruit in large bowl. Add dry pudding mix and cinnamon; toss to coat. Spoon into crust; top with remaining crumb mixture.
Bake 35 min. or until fruit is tender and crust is golden brown. Cool completely. Serve topped with COOL WHIP.
ingredients: 1/2 (15 ounce) package ready-to-use refrigerated pie crust
1 (8 ounce) package PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese, softened
1 (3.4 ounce) package JELL-O Vanilla Flavor Instant Pudding
1 1/4 cups thawed COOL WHIP Whipped Topping
title: Cranberry-Pear Crumble Pie
